DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calendar date of recovery of bone marrow function with neutrophil recovery associated with more than 95% T-cell and myeloid cell chimerism at day 100 post transplantation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Sustained Engraftment at Day 100 Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Sustained donor-derived neutrophil recovery with achievement of donor chimerism equal or greater than 90% at day 100._Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Sustained donor-derived neutrophil recovery with achievement of donor chimerism equal or greater than 90% at day 100.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results or effects (does not include CTC Adverse Events) of therapeutic agents or procedures administered to the patient.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.
